resources.string: You may return all items sold by PICKMALL within 7 days of delivery for a refund, as long as it is unused and in a good condition.
*Notice: Underwear and Swimwear are not allowed to be returned.
For non-quality related reason of return, You can raise a request to return your items with these simple steps:
2. Go to Account -> Orders -> Paid Orders ->Order Detail Page
3. Click on \'Apply for Return\' at the end of page.
4. Fill in the details and submit a return request
After submitting a return request, you can either schedule a pickup or mail the return package by yourself.

The pickup fee is â‚¹90Rs/package, which will be deducted from your refund total. But if it is our fault for a return (like wrong products or damaged products), please find customer service under My Account for a free pickup.
